description.short:
wrapper for the freenect context

do not use this directly

methods.name: buildDeviceList
methods.short: (re)build the list of devices

methods.name: clear
methods.short: clear the freenect context closes all currently connected devices

methods.name: close
methods.short: close a kinect device

methods.name: closeAll
methods.short: closes all currently connected kinects

methods.name: getContext
methods.short: get the raw pointer

methods.name: getDeviceIndex
methods.short: get the deviceList index from an id returns -1 if not found

methods.name: getDeviceIndex
methods.short: get the deviceList index from an id returns -1 if not found

methods.name: getKinect
methods.short: get the kinect object from a device pointer returns NULL if not found

methods.name: init
methods.short: init the freenect context

methods.name: isConnected
methods.short: is a device with this id already connected?

methods.name: isConnected
methods.short: is a device with this serial already connected?

methods.name: isInited
methods.short: is the context inited?

methods.name: listDevices
methods.parameters: bool verbose=false
methods.short: print the device list

methods.name: nextAvailableId
methods.short: get the id of the next available device, returns -1 if nothing found

methods.name: nextAvailableSerial
methods.short: get the serial number of the next available device, returns an empty string "" if nothing found

methods.name: numAvailable
methods.short: get the number of available devices (not connected)

methods.name: numConnected
methods.short: get the number of currently connected devices

methods.name: numTotal
methods.short: get the total number of devices

methods.name: open
methods.parameters: ofxKinect &kinect, int id=-1
methods.short: open a kinect device an id of -1 will open the first available

methods.name: open
methods.parameters: ofxKinect &kinect, string serial
methods.short: open a kinect device by it's unique serial number
